abstract: Three years after buying YouTube, Google agreed Wednesday to acquire On2 Technologies, which sells video compression software, in a much smaller deal.
snippet: Three years after buying YouTube, Google agreed Wednesday to acquire On2 Technologies, which sells video compression software, in a much smaller deal.
lead_paragraph: Three years after buying the video-sharing Web site YouTube, Google is making a much smaller acquisition of a company that helps make online video files smaller.

abstract: Google said on Wednesday it agreed to buy On2 Technologies, which sells video compression software, in a stock deal valued at about $106 million.
snippet: Google said on Wednesday it agreed to buy On2 Technologies, which sells video compression software, in a stock deal valued at about $106 million.

headline.main: Google Buys Web Video Software Firm

abstract: Google recently introduced a new Gmail feature that lets you automatically unsubscribe from unwanted mailings with one click.
snippet: Google recently introduced a new Gmail feature that lets you automatically unsubscribe from unwanted mailings with one click.
lead_paragraph: Is your Gmail inbox sprinkled with old electronic newsletters and mailing-list messages from companies you don’t really care about anymore? Google recently introduced a new Gmail feature that lets you automatically unsubscribe from unwanted mailings with one click. It doesn’t work with every sender yet, but Google is slowly adding more support from more companies.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Say Goodbye to Unwanted E-Newsletters
